alert.note: Alert for Kossuth; Palo Alto (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 11:24PM CDT until June 25 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kossuth County in north central Iowa... East central Palo Alto County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1123 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Whittemore, or 8 miles northwest of Algona, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Algona, Algona Municipal Airport and Aa Call State Park around 1135 PM CDT. Burt around 1140 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Sexton, Titonka and Wesley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
